column1: Little Goat Diner////Salty is the best way to describe the food here. We had the This Little Piggy Went to China
column4: and Pork Belly Pancake. The Little Piggy Went to China was the saltiest of the group. The Pork Belly fries were good. The Pork Belly Pancake (scallion pancake with a slab of pork belly and coleslaw on top) was good and less salty although it wasn't the best scallion pancake that I've ever had.
